channel.title: Account?
channel.description: Ok so im starting up runescape again because ever since i was hacked I didnt want to start again. Now that the wildy is back and thigns are getting better i decided to start up again, i have about 100$ to spend, can that get me a decent account? And whats a good site to get it from? Please someone help, thanks alot.

item.title: Account?
item.dc:creator: @Rock_N_Rolla Rock N Rolla
item.description:
@Rock_N_Rolla wrote:

Best thing to train on is chickens, they have 30 hp and they never hit you if you were full iron and they drop feathers

Read full topic

item.title: Account?
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparc I Am Sparc
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparc wrote:

Don’t use rsgold.com or whatever that site is. My cousin bought 138 for 300 Dollars, next day acc was off website and they kept his cash \End.

Read full topic

item.title: Account?
item.dc:creator: @Ajdakiwii Ajdakiwii
item.description:
@Ajdakiwii wrote:

Davidi2:

What to train on?

Goplins

item.title: Account?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:13, topic:401318”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=498380.msg3644766#msg3644766 date=1309295065]

Make your own account - maxed melee can be obtained in a matter of 30-50 days.

THeres no way, its taken me like 60 days to get 80 attack/96 str/90 def/ 97 range/ 94 mage

He probably means 24/7 botting.

Notice how he also stated range/mage.
[/quote]
That would be MAXED[/quote]

T4_:

Make your own account - maxed melee can be obtained in a matter of 30-50 days.

Read full topic

item.title: Account?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:10, topic:401318”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=498380.msg3644768#msg3644768 date=1309295286]

I’ve had my account for 6 years and have no 99 combat stats :L

What to train on?

You’re most likely not botting - I too have an account with very limited 99’s because it’s a legit account. Pest control is optimal at levels70-80 and 90-99.
[/quote]

Why not just say 70-99?[/quote]
It slows the fuck down in the 80’s - or atleast it seemed it did.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

http://www.mmoexchange.net/forums/

I would highly advise you not to though. Account trading is very risky because the person is almost always able to recover the account back no matter what.
